name: Gloom and Broom
description:
Gloom and Broom is a 2D platformer adventure game driven by a charming and memorable story told from the perspective of the young heroine’s imagination. When young Sarah is told to clean up her room, she imagines herself as Elaine the Purifier battling the forces of evil using only her cleaning supplies! Travel through a colorfully whimsical world threatened by the dark and dirty filth of Xander, Bringer of Filth’s evil creeping crud and crunchy crusties to restore the sparkle of hope to Alterra.

This game is in the very early stages of development.  After playing our evolving game, please take a few moments to share your thoughts on Gloom and Broom.  Your feedback will help us make our game fun and enjoyable for everyone.
